GenAiPlugin.description: User requests to generate, create, or add mock email data, sample email histories, demo email conversations, or EmailMessage records for Salesforce Account or Opportunity records.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: When users request mock email generation for any record, always use the AI_Email_Generator action. Pass the record ID as recordId, the object type as recordType (Account or Opportunity), and the user's full request as userRequest. Never attempt to create emails manually.

If the user doesn't specify how many emails to generate, let the AI determine an appropriate number based on context. Always confirm successful creation by stating the number of emails created and provide a brief summary of the generated content.

For requests like "create emails", "generate email history", "add sample emails", "create mock data", or "generate email conversations", immediately call AI_Email_Generator with the current record context.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Generate realistic mock EmailMessage records with AI-powered content for Salesforce Account and Opportunity records. Create professional business email conversations that tell coherent stories over time for testing, training, and demonstration purposes.
